alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 12:38PM CST until November 19 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Davis Mountains, Eastern Culberson, I- 10/I-20 split. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. Check on pipes, plants, and people.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
